<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Gorget of the Primal Roar](/Equipment.aspx?ID=439)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 611 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1,250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn collar

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This engraved darkwood gorget seems to vibrate with ferocity, granting you a +2 item bonus to Intimidation checks.

<document level="2" id="action-256" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Gorget of the Primal Roar
